pages.text: $(li)The Blast Protection enchantment can be applied in any kind of Helmet, Chestplate, Leggins, Boots, Shields, Horse and Wolf Armors.$(br)$(li)This enchantment reduces the damage receives from explosions and the knockback received by them.
pages.title: Blast Protection

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level IV.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level V of this enchantment using an Ancient Tome (Blast Protection)
